title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, January 15, 2014
teaser: The World Bank says 2014 is going to be a good year for many global economies. As more patients visit doctors for their first check-ups under the Affordable Care Act, you might think the those in the medical lab business would benefit -- but the truth is more complicated.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, January 15, 2014
description: The World Bank says 2014 is going to be a good year for many global economies. As more patients visit doctors for their first check-ups under the Affordable Care Act, you might think the those in the medical lab business would benefit -- but the truth is more complicated.
byline: Bruce Johnson, Alice Walker, D Gorenstein, Dan Bobkoff, Liyna Anwar, David Weinberg, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Allan Sloan and David Brancaccio
